text: Can't believe someone actually built this. What's next, an app that lets you chat with aliens about the stock market?
I'd actually be really interested in that alien stock market app.
Don't give Elon Musk any ideas, he might just launch a startup for it.
I've always wanted to know if ghosts prefer rainy or sunny weather.
Well, with this app you can finally find out!
Tried it. My local ghost said she loves foggy mornings. I'm starting to suspect she's from San Francisco.
Just imagine an app that lets you ask them about the secret treasures they buried. That's a startup I would invest in.
Finally, a weather app that's not trying to sell me umbrellas or sunscreen. Ghosts don't care about advertising, right?
I'm afraid you're wrong. They tried to sell me ghostly ponchos.
